授業目的:
The course objectives are as follows:
a) To become more effective English speakers
b) To learn how to plan, practice and perform speeches of various genres
到達目標: Students will be working on the following aspects of speech: voice (tone, volume, expression, pitch), clarity (articulation, pronunciation, rate, pause), organization (introduction, body, conclusion, visual aid), stage fright, audience analysis, nonverbal communication, etc.
授業方法: Students will learn about different genres of presentations, through lectures, discussions and audio visual materials. Then, students will work on preparing their own presentation for each of those genres.

トピック.授業外学習2: Students will work outside of class to complete presentation slides, visual aids, presentation scripts, etc. Around 2-3 hours of weekly homework can be expected.

評価.教科書Required texts0: There is no required textbook for this course. The instructor will provide necessary materials.
評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Students’ evaluation of this course will be conducted in class, during the period designated by the university, making use of the standard evaluation form.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Regular attendance and active participation, 30%; Presentations, 70%.
